name: vscode-twitch-themer
description: Allow viewers to change your VS Code theme via Twitch chat

twitchThemer.twitchChannelName.title: Twitch Channel to Join
twitchThemer.twitchChannelName.description: The name of the Twitch channel to connect to.

twitchThemer.accessState.title: View Access
twitchThemer.accessState.description: Users who are allowed to use the extension via Twitch chat.

twitchThemer.installState.title: Install Access
twitchThemer.installState.description: Users who are allowed to use the install command.

twitchThemer.autoInstall.title: Auto-install Theme Install Requests
twitchThemer.autoInstall.description: If checked, will auto-install theme install requests. Otherwise, we will prompt you to install.

twitchThemer.autoConnect.title: Auto Connect
twitchThemer.autoConnect.description: Should Twitch Themer automatically connect to Twitch Chat if you're streaming? Twitch Themer will poll Twitch' API to ensure you're streaming prior to connecting.

twitchThemer.redemptionHoldPeriodMinutes.title: Point Redemption Pause Minutes
twitchThemer.redemptionHoldPeriodMinutes.description: The number of minutes to pause theme changes if someone uses a point redemption.

twitchThemer.redemptionHoldId.title: Pause Changes Reward Id
twitchThemer.redemptionHoldId.description: The unique id of the channel point redemption reward.

twitchThemer.installCommand.title: Install SubCommand
twitchThemer.installCommand.description: The install sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.currentCommand.title: Current SubCommand
twitchThemer.currentCommand.description: The current sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.helpCommand.title: Help SubCommand
twitchThemer.helpCommand.description: The help sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.refreshCommand.title: Refresh SubCommand
twitchThemer.refreshCommand.description: The refresh sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.repoCommand.title: Repo SubCommand
twitchThemer.repoCommand.description: The repo sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.banCommand.title: Ban SubCommand
twitchThemer.banCommand.description: The ban sub-command trigger to use.

twitchThemer.random.title: Random SubCommand
twitchThemer.random.description: The random sub-command trigger to use.

scripts.pretest: npm run test-compile && npm run lint
